page.name: xaf/dynamic-queries
page.summary: A powerful XML-based tool called Query Definitions allows developers to define tables, columns, joins, sort orders, and other important data through the use of Meta Information about data relationships. Once a a developer creates a query definition, XAF allows end-users to use simple HTML-based forms to automatically generate SQL accurate and performance-tuned statements to create paged reports or export data to external sources.
